pwr.chrzescijanek.filip.gifa.core.util

Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • pwr.chrzescijanek.filip.gifa.core.util.ImageUtils

  • public final class ImageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for handling images.

      • multiplyTransparencies

        public static void multiplyTransparencies(org.opencv.core.Mat[] transparencySources,
                                          org.opencv.core.Mat[] transparencyDestinations)
        Performs transparency marking on given destination images based on source images. In short, if a pixel is not opaque in the source image, the corresponding pixel in the associated destination image will be marked transparent.
        Parameters:
        transparencySources - transparency source images
        transparencyDestinations - transparency destination images

      • multiplyTransparencies

        public static void multiplyTransparencies(org.opencv.core.Mat transparencySource,
                                          org.opencv.core.Mat transparencyDestination)
        Performs transparency marking on given destination image based on source image. In short, if a pixel is not opaque in the source image, the corresponding pixel in the destination image will be marked transparent.
        Parameters:
        transparencySource - transparency source image
        transparencyDestination - transparency destination image

      • extractMeaningfulPixels

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat[] extractMeaningfulPixels(org.opencv.core.Mat[] images)
        Extracts meaningful pixels from given OpenCV images. A pixel is considered meaningful as long as it and all corresponding pixels from other images are opaque.
        Parameters:
        images - OpenCV images
        Returns:
        extracted pixels
